translations: n.[内科]内科医生（physician 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Well, physicians make judgment calls every day.
sentences.translation: 其实，医生们每天都会做出一些本能的判断。

sentences.sentence: Elderly people need time and compassion from their physicians.
sentences.translation: 老年人需要医生的时间和同情心。

sentences.sentence: Ten years ago physicians were allowed more discretion.
sentences.translation: 十年前，医生有更多的自由裁量权。
